scripts.dev:docker: nodemon --watch . --ext js,json,html,css --exec 'docker stop fullstack-backend-local && docker rm fullstack-backend-local && docker rmi franciszabala/fullstack-backend || true && docker build -t franciszabala/fullstack-backend . && docker run -p 28080:8080 --name fullstack-backend-local franciszabala/fullstack-backend'
